The statement made by Akbar Al Baker: the CEO of Qatar Airways, claiming that their average fleet age is four years and one month.
The comparison made by Al Baker between: stating that Delta flies planes that are 35 years old.
The accusation made by Delta Air Lines: United Airlines, and American Airlines that Middle East airlines, including Qatar Airways, have received $42 billion in "unfair" subsidies.
The response from Qatar Airways: stating that the funds invested in the airline by the State of Qatar are legitimate equity.
